p: The assay was carried out on three tumor cell lines, human cervical cancer (HeLa), human hepatocellular liver carcinoma (HepG2) and human colon cancer (HT-29) which were obtained from ATCC (USA). HeLa, HepG2 and HT-29 cells were maintained in DMEM/high glucose supplemented with 2 mM l-glutamine, 10% fetal calf serum and 1% penicillin-streptomycin.
